name: Amen Breakers
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CONTROLS

RT/Shift - press and hold to sprint
Rb/F - spray grafiti
Face down/Space - jump
Face up/Z - interact (talk to NPCs)
Face right/X - Trick (midair only)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

a small jet set style game where you can skate around and tag up, mostly a tech demo made for now, will be improved in the future

Team:

lead programmer: darkdranz

level design, programming: spacebasssoft

modeling: mom$

ui: ghosty

directing and lazyass: burggg
